## Who I am ?

I am an associate professor in the University of Bordeaux since September 2018. I do my research activity in Biostatistic's team in the Bordeaux population heath center (INSERM UMR1219). It rocks and I am often rockupied !

## Software

* *BQt* is a downloadable R-package. This package concerns the estimation of quantile regression joint models, linear quantile mixed models, and linear quantile regression, using Bayesian approach.
[[GitHub]](https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.16807)
* *JMcuR* is a downloadable R-package from GitHub. This package includes all programs associated with the published research in Barbieri and Legrand (2019).
[[GitHub]](https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.16807)
* *QoLSEM* is a downloadable R-package from GitHub. This package includes programs associated with the published research in Barbieri A, Tami M et al. (2018).
[[GitHub]](https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.16807)
